participant_1.background:
I'm the only one in my family who has crazy hair.
i enjoy playing computer games.
I'm looking for a home with a big yard for my pets to play in and a kitchen where I can cook my favorite Mexican food.
i cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows.
I've been in the best shape of my life thanks to regular exercise.

participant_2.background:
I have a hidden stash of romance novels that my parents would disapprove of.
I'm really excited to focus on my family and partner now that I've quit my job.
i listen to rock music.
i listen to folk music.
I spend my days driving around Los Angeles in my foreign car looking for dates.

content.text: Hey, I'm new to the area. What are some fun things to do here?
Well, there's a lot of great restaurants and bars. I like to go to the beach and play volleyball. There's also a lot of live music here.
I love live music! What kind of music do you like?
I like all kinds of music, but I really love rock and folk music.
Me too! I love going to concerts.
Me too! I'm going to a rock concert next week.
Oh, that sounds fun! Who are you going to see?
I'm going to see Guns N' Roses.
I love Guns N' Roses! I've seen them in concert a few times.
That's awesome! I've never seen them in concert before.
You're in for a treat! They're amazing live.
Me neither! I'm sure it's going to be a great show.
